project.title: Dark Souls 3 Item Finder
project.description: Allows the user to search DS3 armor and the site tells you where to obtain it. Learn objective: PHP

project.title: Coop Game List
project.description: A learning project for simple registering, login and list management.. The site allows registered users to add and remove games to the list. Learn objective: PHP, MySQL

project.title: Simple Text Adventure
project.description: A simple text adventure. Learn objective: Javascript

project.title: SimpleRPG - TKInter
project.description: An optional GUI project for TTY’s Python Course. I made an simple “RPG” Game with TKinter.

project.title: 3D/2D Assets and Models
project.description: Various assets for 3D and 2D Tools: 3DS Max, Photoshop,

project.title: An Animation
project.description: A Final Turn in project for 3D Animation Course in Kyamk. Tools: 3DS Max, Photoshop,

project.title: Faucet Man
project.description: A small short animation for 3D Animation Course in Kyamk. I produced all the 3D content and animation, rest of the group designed the concept.

project.title: Oskuman
project.description: A small short animation for 2D Animation Course in Kyamk. A short megaman inspired animation based on my friend who is now a robotman. Tools: AE, Photoshop, 3DS Max, Premiere
